column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////THE FOOD: For both of our visits
column2: we ordered the same pizza with only one (regretful) difference. I ordered a pepperoni deep dish and my friend had tomatoes
column4: cheese deep dish. For our first time
column5: our waiter recommended we got the buttery crust
column6: as it made it crispy and flavorful. So we did
column7: and wow! AMAZING!!!!! We were so delighted. The crust was garlic-y
column9: crunchy yet still heavenly soft! However
column10: for our call-in order we forgot to tell them to add it
column11: and though the crust wasn't bad on it own
column13: too plain and it didn't have as great of a texture as our first one did.
